# Meryll Dindin

> AI executive and serial entrepreneur working across AI, healthcare, education, security, and longevity. UC Berkeley and Ecole Centrale Paris (now CentraleSupélec) alumnus based in Henderson, Nevada.

Canonical Origin: https://merylldindin.com

## Ventures

- [Parallel: Scaling K-12 Teletherapy](https://merylldindin.com/ventures/parallel-learning/index.md): VP of Product and Engineering at the leading K-12 teletherapy platform, serving 25+ states
- [Polygon: Learning Differences Support](https://merylldindin.com/ventures/polygon/index.md): Co-founded digital psychology practice for remote ADHD and dyslexia evaluations
- [Dillygence: Manufacturing Intelligence](https://merylldindin.com/ventures/dillygence/index.md): Fractional CTO and Board Member for Industry 4.0 digital twin solutions
- [Auberge de Cercoux](https://merylldindin.com/ventures/auberge-de-cercoux/index.md): Digital and business strategy for family gastronomic restaurant in Charente-Maritime
- [CalAster: Crisis Management](https://merylldindin.com/ventures/calaster/index.md): Co-founded AI-powered emergency response and mental health platform at UC Berkeley
- [Fujitsu: AI for Heart Health](https://merylldindin.com/ventures/fujitsu/index.md): Deep learning researcher applying Topological Data Analysis for arrhythmia detection
- [Sysnav: Navigation Technologies](https://merylldindin.com/ventures/sysnav/index.md): Data scientist working on Parkinson's disease management with ActiMyo device

## Articles

- [Demystifying Learning Differences](https://merylldindin.com/thoughts/learning-differences/index.md): Research on dyslexia, ADHD, and innovative approaches to supporting neurodivergent learners
- [Generative AI for Children's Storytelling](https://merylldindin.com/thoughts/future-of-storytelling/index.md): How generative AI reshapes children's storytelling while addressing ethical concerns
- [TDA for Arrhythmia Classification](https://merylldindin.com/thoughts/arrhythmia-classification/index.md): Applying Topological Data Analysis in deep learning for cardiac arrhythmia detection
- [Exploring Human Cognition and Intelligence](https://merylldindin.com/thoughts/models-human-cognition/index.md): Fluid and crystallized intelligence, Cattell-Horn-Carroll theory, and the Flynn effect
- [ML for Sleep Stage Classification](https://merylldindin.com/thoughts/sleep-stage-classification/index.md): Machine learning techniques for EEG-based automated sleep stage classification
- [Clustering with the ToMATo Algorithm](https://merylldindin.com/thoughts/tomato-clustering/index.md): Topological Data Analysis clustering through the ToMATo algorithm
- [Topological Data Analysis for Deep Learning](https://merylldindin.com/thoughts/topological-data-analysis/index.md): Core TDA concepts — persistence homology, Betti curves, and persistence landscapes
